statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE engagement_score > 5;
SELECT content_id, interaction_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_activity WHERE content_id = 10 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, activity_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_id, engagement_score FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE engagement_score > 8 AND interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT user_id, MAX(engagement_score) AS highest_engagement FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_activity ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, ua.activity_type FROM users u JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE users.username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT AVG(duration_minutes) AS avg_duration FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Login';
SELECT * FROM UserActivity;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, average_rating FROM CourseEngagement ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM ContentImprovement WHERE improvement_type = 'Bug Fix' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT course_id, total_views FROM CourseEngagement WHERE average_rating > 4;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp, course_id FROM UserActivity ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT course_id, total_views, average_rating, most_viewed_lesson FROM CourseEngagement WHERE average_rating > 4.5;
SELECT content_id, improvement_type, improvement_description FROM ContentImprovement WHERE improvement_type = 'Bug Fix' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserActivity JOIN CourseEngagement ON UserActivity.course_id = CourseEngagement.course_id;

SELECT UserActivity.user_id, CourseEngagement.course_id, ContentImprovement.content_id FROM UserActivity JOIN CourseEngagement ON UserActivity.course_id = CourseEngagement.course_id LEFT JOIN ContentImprovement ON ContentImprovement.content_id = UserActivity.user_id WHERE UserActivity.activity_type = 'comment' GROUP BY UserActivity.user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, progress_percent FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percent >= 50;
SELECT activity_type, activity_details FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, progress_percent FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percent >= 50 ORDER BY progress_percent DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT email, registration_date FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_level FROM engagement WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM content WHERE content_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM content ORDER BY content_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, a.activity_type, e.engagement_level FROM users u JOIN activities a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN engagement e ON a.activity_id = e.activity_id WHERE u.username = 'jane_smith';
SELECT u.username, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM users u JOIN sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'j%';
